We have been working continuously to provide you with the best experience and quality with Crypviser Secure Messenger. This update includes scheduled improvements bug fixes and a new feature floating popup window for video calls! Now you will be able to have a video call with your partner while still being able to quickly reply to your messages in chat window. The video will be streamed on a floating window that will let you access the rest of the app in the background. You can switch back to the voice video call by tapping on the floating window. Enjoy the Crypviser!
A scheduled update with improvements of UI and some native features

This is the official commercial release of Crypviser Secure Messenger The Worlds Most Secure Messenger It comes packed with new features designs privacy protections and more. PRIVACY CONTROLS TO GIVE YOU OVER YOUR DATA This release includes new revolutionary features designed to further protect your privacy. Screenshot Control: With Screenshot Control users can choose to receive notifications if a screenshot is taken of their chats. Privacy Controls: If you don t want your messages to be forwarded simply use Forward Control to disable message forwarding. Users also have the option to receive notifications if a message has been forwarded. The applies to chats being copied as well. In addition to these features comes also the ability to withhold your user name as the author of a forwarded message. SUBSCRIPTION PLANS Download and register now to receive a full featured free trial of the worlds most secure messenger. After the free trial you can choose from the following low cost subscription plans: 1 Month Plan 4.49 EUR 3 Month Plan 12.49 EUR 5 discount or 4.16 EUR monthly 6 Month Plan 22.99 EUR 10 discount or 3 83 EUR monthly 12 Month Plan 42.99 EUR 20 discount or 3.58 EUR monthly Inside the App you can see the subscription fees in your local currency and applied terms conditions. NEW FEATURES Requests History: Users can now see the history of all contact requests in the Contact manager. Search for messages in chat: It s not necessary to review long conversations to find a specific message or text. With the new search feature in the chat window you can easily find whatever you are looking for. And of course it s coming with the same unparalleled security core and improved features which you already love! Crypviser Secure Messenger Secure Private Messaging For Everyone

This update includes essential improvements within the Crypviser Secure Messenger core effecting the scope of different features the stability and quality. CHANGES Greatly improved quality of HD video calls with a new high efficiency codec. This will require less connection bandwidth but will still provide the best quality and experience Improved voice quality with bandwidth adaptive smart audio codecs which automatically adapts to the signal and internet connection quality. CSMP protocol changes. We have made some changes and improvements which increases the reliability and delivery of your secure messages. Updated UI UX of media library. We have updated the look of the photo video view and send function. Minor bug fixes NEW FEATURES You can now share not only photo video but different numerous types of documents and files. File Data transfer support for PDF and DOC EXCEL and others. UNLIMITED media data exchange! Send as many media data files as you want without restrictions or limitations. Animated GIF support added in secure chats.

IMPORTANT UPDATE: In reference to updating to enable cross platform compatibility. Please make sure that you have updated to the newest version in order to communicate with the Crypviser Secure Messaging app on other platforms.

We have been working non stop to provide you with the best possible quality experience within the Crypviser App. In this update the following changes were made. Security core improvements Fixed issues with forwarding message Random bug fixes Improved features voice messages suspended chat logic when contact is removed Minor UI UX updates IMPORTANT NOTICE: If you are still using QR code from previous releases please update it by generating a new QR code in the Settings screen.
minor bug fixed crash with Touch ID login fixed

We ve worked diligently to introduce significant update to Crypviser Secure Messaging app from the first release and very excited to introduce completely revised UX in along with a new fresh look and lot of new features. In this release we have focused on usability and a more friendly user experience. IMPORTANT NOTICE This release is not compatible with v.1.5 and older. Please make sure that your partner has new update to enjoy highly secure and quality communication with Crypviser. UPDATES AND NEW FEATURES The redesigned account registration wizard simplifies the process and makes it easier for any user regardless of their experience. The new contact search function in blockchain is easier through the new Contact Manager feature. With Contact Manager you can conveniently manage all outgoing and incoming requests accept or decline invitations with just one click. You can start a chat call or video call send voice messages and share media immediately after adding a contact in your list. Now you can also invite your friends to use Crypviser with just few clicks by sending them messages via SMS Email or share in other instant messaging apps. Customize chat background choose a preferred tone and other options This release comes with an exciting feature that allows you to backup all your encrypted data on a Desktop via Airdrop MAC or iCloud. The backup data is fully secured and protected by your password. By making Crypviser account backups you won t lose any of your data or contacts in case of recovering your account after reinstalling the app or changing your device. More exciting new features are described in Crypviser s public press releases in media blog and social networks.

CHANGE LOG v. 5.1 The accounts with expired subscriptions now can be automatically renewed after charging the balance Fixed a bug which was causing a crash with enabled Face ID authorization Many other improvements and bug fixes IMPORTANT NOTICE FOR EXISTING USER ACCOUNTS! 1. If you are upgrading from 1.3.x release please UNINSTALL REMOVE the Crypviser App first and then install the newest version 1.5 If the free period of your subscription is expired you should charge your CVT balance for to auto renew or register a new account to get an extra free trial period for 1 month. USEFUL TIPS 1. During the registration of a new account you can save a backup QR code in your local photo library. You can also print or mail the QR code after clicking on the Export button in the Backup your data screen. 2. After completion of an account registration wizard you can save your QR backup code and change the authorization method in the Profile Settings screen 3. Only saved contacts appear in the Crypviser contact list. All unknown contacts are only visible in the Recent list and can be saved as a Crypviser contact through the swipe menu or in the contact profile.
